div.h1: Bob Hope SchoolHonesty. Integrity. Respect. Service.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Middle and High School Band/Strings Materials
a.span: Middle and High School Band/Strings Materials

li.a: Middle and High School Band/Strings Materials

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);
p.em: Attention students: We are asking you to notify us confidentially by email if any of these statements apply to you:

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);
p.em: 1) I am personally exhibiting COVID-19 symptoms.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);
p.em: 2) I have tested positive for COVID-19.

p.style: line-height: 23px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);
p.em: 3) Someone in my immediate circle has tested positive for COVID-19 that I have been in close contact with.

em.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-size: 10pt;

div.em: If the answer is 'yes', please send us a confidential email to COVID19@bobhopeschool.org. Be sure to include your name and grade level and let us know which statement(s) apply to you. This callout statement will be posted on our website. Again, the email address is: COVID19@bobhopeschool.org (no hyphen!) Thank you.

span.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

div.span: Atencin estudiantes: le pedimos que nos notifique confidencialmente por correo electrnico si alguna de estas declaraciones se aplica a usted:

br.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

span.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

br.span: 1) Estoy exhibiendo personalmente los sntomas de COVID-19.

br.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

span.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

br.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

span.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

br.span: 3) Alguien en mi crculo inmediato ha dado positivo por COVID-19 con el que he estado en contacto cercano.

br.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

span.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

br.span: Si la respuesta es 's', envenos un correo electrnico confidencial a COVID19@bobhopeschool.org. Asegrese de incluir su nombre y nivel de grado y hganos saber qu declaraciones se aplican a usted. Esta declaracin de llamada se publicar en nuestro sitio web. Nuevamente, la direccin de correo electrnico es: COVID19@bobhopeschool.org (sin guin!) Gracias.

br.style: color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(230, 230, 230);

span.style: color: black; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Effective immediately, all Bob Hope Schools will follow the Executive Order issued by Governor Greg Abbott to

span.style: color: black; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: close all our campuses for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. The health and safety of our students and staff is priority. We ask everyone in our community to do your part to help prevent the Spread of Coronavirus COVID-19.

span.style: color: black; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Though our campuses will remain closed, we will continue with our Flexible Educational Program until the end of this school year. We remain dedicated to the education and success of our students. We thank our parents and teachers who continue to support students with their distance learning. We will continue to update our parents via the district's mass communication system, social media sites, and website.

Con vigencia inmediata, todas las Escuelas Bob Hope seguirn la Orden Ejecutiva emitida por el Gobernador Greg Abbott para cerrar nuestros campus por el resto del ao escolar 2019-2020. La salud y seguridad de nuestros estudiantes y personal es prioridad. Pedimos a todos en nuestra comunidad que hagan su parte para ayudar a prevenir la propagacin del virus.

Aunque nuestras escuelas permanecern cerradas, continuaremos con nuestro Programa Educativo Flexible hasta el final de este ao escolar. Seguimos dedicados a la educacin y al xito de nuestros estudiantes. Agradecemos a nuestros padres y maestros que continan apoyando a los estudiantes con su aprendizaje a distancia. Continuaremos actualizando a nuestros padres a travs del sistema de comunicacin masiva del distrito, los sitios de redes sociales y el sitio web.

img.br: This link is a video that shows step by step how to log in to the student's Microsoft Teams account. This account is where they will access their online course materials.

br.a: El siguiente enlace es un video que muestra paso a paso cmo iniciar sesin en la cuenta de Microsoft Teams del alumno. Esta cuenta es donde accedern a los materiales del curso en lnea.
